item.title: End I-86 West at I-84
item.description: End I-86 west at I-84. Merge right onto Exit 1 for I-84 East/Ogden/Salt Lake. Continue ahead for I-84/US-30 West/Twin Falls. This is the western end of I-86.

item.title: Pocatello Creek Road West at I-15
item.description: Pocatello Creek Road west at I-15. Use I-15 North for I-86, Twin Falls and Idaho Falls. Continue straight on Pocatello Creek Road for I-15 South and BL-15 to City Center.

item.title: I-86 East - Exit 58 Offramp at US-30
item.description: I-86 East - Exit 58 offramp at US-30. US-30 leaves I-86 eastbound here. Turn right for US-30 East to West Pocatello.

item.title: I-86 East - Exit 36
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 36 - BL-86/ID-37/American Falls/Rockland.

item.title: I-86 East - Exit 15
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 15 - Raft River

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 222
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 222 - I-86/US-30 East/Pocatello. Continue west on I-84/US-30 West for Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 222
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 222 - I-86 East/US-30/Pocatello. Use I-84 east for Salt Lake. I-86 begins here.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching I-86
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 222 - I-86/US-30 East/Pocatello. Use I-84 east for Salt Lake. This interchange has recently been rebuilt and re-designed.

item.title: End BL-86/ID-39 at I-86
item.description: Frontage Road at I-86/US-30/BL-86/ID-39 junction. Use I-86/US-30 East to Pocatello; I-86/US-30 West to Twin Falls. Use BL-84/ID-39 (not marked here) to American Falls.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 222
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 222 - I-86/US-30 East/Pocatello.

item.title: US-91 South at I-86
item.description: US-91 south at I-86 (Exit 61). Merge right for I-86 West to American Falls and Twin Falls. Use I-86 East/To I-15 for Idaho Falls and Salt Lake City (Utah). Continue south on US-91 for Pocatello.

item.title: I-86 West at I-84
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 1 - I-84 East/Ogden/Salt Lake and I-84 West/US-30 West/Twin Falls. I-86 ends at I-84.

item.title: I-86 West Approaching I-84
item.description: I-86 west approaching Exit 1 - I-84 West/Ogden (Utah)/Salt Lake (Utah). This is the west end of I-86.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 56
item.description: I-86 west approaching Exit 56 - Pocatello Regional Airport.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 72 and 71
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 72 - I-86 West/Twin Falls/Chubbuck. Approaching Exit 71 - BL-15/Pocatello. Continue south on I-15 for Salt Lake. The BL-15 shield on Exit 71 is incorrectly labeled as I-15.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 72
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 72 - I-86 West/Chubbuck/Twin Falls. Continue south on I-15 for Pocatello and Salt Lake (Utah).

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 72
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 72 - I-86 West Junction.

item.title: I-86 East - Freeway Entrance
item.description: Freeway Entrance on I-86 east. This style sign assembly for freeway entrances is not very common in Idaho. Also, note that the I-86 shield has the text IDAHO in it, which is also pretty rare. Most of the interstate shields that have the text IDAHO in them are older. This sign appears to be newer.

item.title: I-86 Exit 36 Offramp at BL-86/ID-37
item.description: I-86 Exit 36 offramp at BL-86/ID-37. Turn right on ID-37 south for Rockland. Turn left for BL-86 East to American Falls and Aberdeen (via ID-39). This is the west end of the American Falls business loop.

item.title: I-86 (Exit 21) Offramp at Coldwater Area
item.description: I-86/US-30 East (Exit 21) Offramp at Coldwater Area jct. Turn right for Coldwater Area and Frontage Road.

item.title: US-91 South at I-86 East (To I-15)
item.description: US-91 south at I-86 (Exit 61) onramp. Turn left on I-86 for Idaho Falls, and Salt Lake City via I-15.

item.title: US-91 South at I-86 East (To I-15)
item.description: US-91 south at I-86 (Exit 61) onramp. Turn left on I-86 for Idaho Falls, and Salt Lake City via I-15.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 61 Offramp at US-91
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 61 offramp, US-91 jct. Use US-91 north for Chubbuck. Use US-91 south for Pocatello.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 61
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 61 - US-91/Chubbuck.

item.title: End I-86 West at I-84
item.description: End I-86 west at I-84. Merge right onto Exit 1 for I-84 East/Ogden/Salt Lake. Continue ahead for I-84/US-30 West/Twin Falls. This is the western end of I-86.

item.title: I-86 West at I-84
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 1 - I-84 East/Ogden/Salt Lake and I-84 West/US-30 West/Twin Falls. I-86 ends at I-84.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 56
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 56 - Pocatello Regional Airport.

item.title: I-86 West - Fort Hall Indian Reservation
item.description: Entering the Fort Hall Indian Reservation on I-86 west.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 58
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 58 - West Pocatello. US-30 joins I-86 here westbound.

item.title: I-86 West - Freeway Entrance
item.description: I-86 west onramp at Exit 61. The Freeway Entrance type sign assembly is not common in Idaho.

item.title: US-91 North at I-86
item.description: US-91 north at I-86 (Exit 61) onramp. Turn right on I-86 for Idaho Falls and Salt Lake. Continue over overpass for I-86 west to Twin Falls. US-91 continues north to Chubbuck.

item.title: US-91 South at I-86 East (To I-15)
item.description: US-91 south at I-86 east (To I-15). Use I-86 east for Idaho Falls and Salt Lake. Continue south on US-91 for Pocatello. I-86 east ends at I-15 just east of here.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 61 Offramp at US-91
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 61 offramp, US-91 jct. Use US-91 north for Chubbuck. Use US-91 south for Pocatello. US-91 north is part of the Oregon/California Trail - Goodale Cutoff.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 61
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 61 - US-91/Chubbuck.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 61
item.description: I-86 West approaching Exit 61 - US-91/Chubbuck. This is the first exit westbound on I-86.

item.title: I-15 North at Exit 72
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 72 - I-86 West/Twin Falls/Chubbuck. Continue north on I-15 for Blackfoot and Idaho Falls. This is the last exit on I-15 north in the Pocatello area.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 72
item.description: Approaching Exit 72 - I-86 west to Twin Falls and Chubbuck on I-15 north. Continue north on I-15 for Blackfoot and Idaho Falls.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 222
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 222 - I-86/US-30 East/Pocatello. This is the western end of I-86 (western segment). I-84 west joins US-30 here.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 222
item.description: I-84 east at I-86 east to I-15 and Pocatello. Use I-84 east for Ogden and Salt Lake.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching I-86
item.description: I-84 east approaching I-86 east to I-15 and Pocatello. Use I-84 west for Ogden and Salt Lake.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 1
item.description: End I-86 west at Exit 1 - I-84 East/Ogden/Salt Lake. Continue ahead for I-84/US-30 West/Twin Falls. Taken from underpass on I-84 east.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 222
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 222 - I-86/US-30 East/Pocatello. Continue west on I-84/US-30 for Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 222
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 222 - I-86/US-30 East/Pocatello.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 222
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 222 - I-86/US-30 East/Pocatello.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 33
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 33 - Neeley Area.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 40
item.description: I-86 West at Exit 40 - BL-86/ID-39/American Falls/Aberdeen.

item.title: US-30 West at I-86 West
item.description: US-30 west at I-86 to Airport, American Falls, and Twin Falls. US-30 west joins I-86 to its western terminus - then joins I-84 west to Heyburn.

item.title: I-84 East - Next Services via I-84 and I-86
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 216. This sign shows the next services on I-84 and I-86. The next gas along I-86 is 42 miles (American Falls).

item.title: End I-86 East at Exits63AB at I-15
item.description: End I-86 at I-15 Exit 63A - I-15 South/Salt Lake, Exit 63B - I-15 North/Blackfoot/Idaho Falls.

item.title: I-86 East - Pocatello Exits Use I-15 South
item.description: Use I-15 south for Pocatello Exits on I-86 east.

item.title: I-86 East Exit 61/Exit 63
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 61, US-91/Chubbuck/Yellowstone Ave., approaching Exit 63AB - I-15/Idaho Falls/Blackfoot/Salt Lake, 1 mile.

item.title: I-86 East Exit 63 - I-15 Jct.
item.description: I-86 east approaching I-15/Idaho Falls/Salt Lake, 2 miles.

item.title: I-86 East Exit 61
item.description: I-86 east approaching Exit 61, US-91/Chubbuck/Yellowstone Ave., 1 mile.

item.title: I-86 East - Entering Bannock County
item.description: I-86 east at Bannock county line at the Portneuf River.

item.title: I-86 East - Exit 58
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 58 - US-30/West Pocatello.

item.title: End I-86 West at I-84
item.description: End I-86 west at I-84 to Twin Falls and Ogden

item.title: I-15 North at Exit 72 at I-86 West
item.description: I-15 north at I-86 west to Twin Falls

item.title: I-15 North at Exit 72, I-86 West
item.description: I-86 west to Twin Falls next left on I-15 north

item.title: I-86 West Approaching I-84
item.description: I-84 east to Ogden, 2 Miles on I-86 west

item.title: I-86 West at I-84
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 1, I-84 east

item.title: I-86 East - Pocatello Next 5 Exits
item.description: Pocatello Next 5 Exits on I-86 east

item.title: I-86 East Exit 15
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 15, Raft River

item.title: I-86 East Exit 21
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 21, Coldwater Area

item.title: I-86 East Exit 28
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 28, Massacre Rocks State Park

item.title: I-86 East Exit 33
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 33, Neeley Area

item.title: I-86 East Exit 36
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 36, BL-86/ID-37 Jct

item.title: I-86 East Exit 40
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 40, ID-39 Junction

item.title: I-86 East Exit 44
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 44, Seagull Bay

item.title: I-86 East Exit 49
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 49, Rainbow Road

item.title: I-86 East Exit 52
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 52, Arbon Valley

item.title: I-86 East Exit 56
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 56, Pocatello Air Terminal

item.title: I-86 East Exit 61
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 61, US-91/Yellowstone Ave

item.title: End I-86 West at I-84
item.description: End I-86 west at I-84 (Exit 1). Use Exit 1 for I-84 East to Ogden; continue straight for I-84/US-30 West to Twin Falls.

item.title: I-86 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-86 west. Distance to American Falls, Burley, and Twin Falls.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 21
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 21 - Coldwater Area.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 40
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 40 - BL-86/ID-39/American Falls/Aberdeen.

item.title: I-86 West Approaching Exit 40
item.description: I-86 west approaching Exit 40 - BL-84/ID-39/American Falls/Aberdeen.

item.title: I-86 West Approaching I-84
item.description: I-86 west approaching Exit 1 - I-84 West/Ogden. This is the west end of I-86.

item.title: US-91 South Approaching I-86
item.description: US-91 south approaching I-86. Use I-86 east for I-15.

item.title: US-91 South at I-86
item.description: US-91 south at I-86 west to American Falls and Twin Falls. Continue south on US-91 for Pocatello.

item.title: BL-86 West at I-86/US-30/ID-37
item.description: BL-86 west approaching I-86/US-30. Continue over freeway for ID-37 south.

item.title: End I-86 East at I-15 - Exit 63AB
item.description: End I-86 at I-15 Junction

item.title: I-86 East Exit 63
item.description: I-86 Approaching I-15 To Idaho Falls and Salt Lake

item.title: I-86 Idaho - Closeup - Exit 28
item.description: I-86 Idaho Shield at Exit 28 Onramp

item.title: I-86 Onramp at Exit 28
item.description: I-86 Freeway Entrance at Massacre Rocks State Park

item.title: US-91 North at I-86
item.description: I-15/I-86/US-91 Shields on Yellowstone Ave. North

item.title: I-86/US-30 at Exit 16 onramp
item.description: Yale Road north at I-86/US-30 onramp at Exit 16 - Raft River Area
